TITLE: Episode 43 - My Science is Better than YOUR Science
DESCRIPTION: The LesbiVixen Kim (@Lesbertarian) joins Jessie and Maddie for some lockdown chatter over a glass (of varying sizes) of wine. We talk about the psychological warfare being waged on us all, and how the mainstream and the public’s religion of backing the Saintly Scientists seems to be nothing but a doomsday cult. We’re here to help keep your sanity in check, YWFOS.
